name: DJ Master (itch) (Crowned)
description:
Feel the Rhythm ! Feel the Music !

***Crush the note Balls in rhythm with the music, when they reach the glow line

***Don't crush the red Mines !

***Easy controls :

  • right, left, up/down arrows for right, left and center columns

Five free songs available

2 View modes : Front and Far Perpective

NEW songs to come later (Game frequently updated !)

VEDG launcher by Noiros, https://noiros.itch.io
